(BIG) second-quarter 2012 earnings of $0.36 per share missed the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.41 and plunged 28% from $0.50 earned in the year-ago quarter. Though total revenue did increase 4.4% to $1,218 million, it fell short of the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1,240 million. Margins also remained under pressure, while gross margin shriveled 30 basis points, operating margin contracted 190 basis points.}
